title: Curling Special: Team USA Gold
description: Neil Paine and Nate Silver sit down with the USA curling team to talk about stats in curling and what it was like to win gold at Pyeongchang.

itunes:author: FiveThirtyEight, 538, Neil Paine, Geoff Foster, Sara Ziegler
